titles.title: PHMSA Voluntary Information Sharing Act
PHMSA Voluntary Information Sharing Act

A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Transportation to establish a confidential, voluntary information-sharing system to encourage the sharing of pipeline safety data and information in a nonpunitive context in order to improve the safety of pipeline facilities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
